text: Which animal do you wish you could talk to?
How is the human race going to end?
Are you looking forward to retiring?
What are people from your city or region called?
What do you wish you had known before you started school?
Would you rather live without music or television?
What couldn’t you forgive?
What was/is your grandmother’s cooking like?
In the future, do you think technology will mean that we won’t need to learn languages?
What should you do when you are 20 so you have no regrets when you are 40?
What would you like to try that you’ve never done?
Have you ever been motivated to completely change your life?
If dinosaurs had never gone extinct, what would life be like?
What do you think video games will be like in 20 years from now?
What is the worst traffic jam you have ever been in?
Where are you going on your next holiday?
Can you keep a secret?
What name would you not like to have?
When did you last make a silly mistake?
When was the last time you laughed?
Have you ever been in a police car?
Do you like to have deep, meaningful conversations?
Are you a morning or night person?
If you have to think of a happy place, where do you think of?
If you had to change your name, what would you change it to?
Were you bullied at school?
